name: The 8-Bit Bar
description:
The 8-Bit Bar About:

This is a game I made on the course over a weekend. I found an old prototype on my old hard drive made with Unity and decided to revive the project in the new release of Godot 4. Hope ya like it!

How to play:

Can you serve the the drinks to all of your picky customers? In this game you take the role as a bartender that serves drinks to your customers but everything isn't just buttery smooth! If you serve too many customers something that thy didn't ask for, they will leave a bad review on you bar! If you get too many bad reviews, you need to close down the bar!

Controls:

Press on the right shelf or container that the customer wants: Milk in the fridge, apple juice on the middle shelf and some spicy chillisauce on the far right.
